directions: Place cauliflower in a pot with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil and cook 10 minutes, or until tender. Drain and return cauliflower to pot.
Stir butter, black pepper, salt, and garlic into cooked cauliflower.
Mash cauliflower mixture with a potato masher or whisk until a smooth consistency similar to mashed potatoes.
title: Smashed Cauliflower Side Dish
